name: Revolution (itch) (Wicked)
description:
A game about scavenging from your local surrounding and gathering enough money to eventually escape and reach a so-called 'safe haven'.The event that caused this entire collapse was due to a sudden loss of electricity as it became a sparse resource and society as we knew it began to fall apart completely.

------
Controls
------
Yellow Squares - Click on the square to move
Blue Squares - Click to interact (Normally pick up item or open GUI)
Red Squares - Click to attack
ESC - Open inventory (Click on inventory Items to use them the bat can be equipped and bandages can be used)
